sourcesContent:
<template lang="html">
  <v-dialog v-model="dialog">
    <template v-slot:activator="{ on }">
      <v-btn color="primary" dark v-on="on">Customise Asset Allocation</v-btn>
    </template>
    <v-form  @submit.prevent="onSubmit">
      <v-container>
        <v-row>
          <v-col
            :cols="2">
            <v-card>
              <v-card-title>
                Asset Type
              </v-card-title>
            </v-card>
          </v-col>
          <v-col
            :cols="5">
            <v-card>
              <v-card-title>
                Custom Asset Name
              </v-card-title>
            </v-card>
          </v-col>
          <v-col
            :cols="5">
            <v-card>
              <v-card-title>
                Actual Asset Name
              </v-card-title>
            </v-card>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row
          v-for="AAName in RPAANames"
          :key="AAName.id">
          <v-col
            :cols="2">
              <v-text-field
                @keyup="addToModified(AAName)"
                v-model="AAName.asset_type"
                label="Asset Type"
                clearable outlined dense solo />
          </v-col>
          <v-col
            :cols="5">
              <v-text-field
                @keyup="addToModified(AAName)"
                v-model="AAName.custom_name"
                label="Custom Asset Allocation Name"
                clearable outlined dense solo/>
          </v-col>
          <v-col
            :cols="5">
            <v-card>
              <v-card-text>
                {{ AAName.name }}
              </v-card-text>
            </v-card>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>
          <v-btn type="submit" color="primary" dark dense>Customise</v-btn>
        </v-row>
      </v-container>
    </v-form>
  </v-dialog>
</template>

<script>
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service.js";

export default {
  name: "AANameConfig",
  props: {
    RPAANames: {
      type: Array,
      required: true,
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      dialog: false,
      modifiedList: [],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    addToModified(item) {
      if (!(this.modifiedList.includes(item))) {
        this.modifiedList.push(item);
      }
    },
    onSubmit() {
      for (let i=0; i< this.modifiedList.length; i++){
          let endpoint = `/api/activeriskprofilenames/${this.modifiedList[i].id}/`;
          apiService(endpoint, "PATCH", {
            custom_name: this.modifiedList[i].custom_name,
            asset_type: this.modifiedList[i].asset_type,
          }).then(data => {
            console.log("Updated");
            console.log(data);
          })
        }

    }
  },
  mounted() {
  }
};
</script>
